
lxml is used for generate docx

http://lxml.de/

Installer
https://pypi.python.org/pypi/lxml/2.3


Powerful and Pythonic XML processing library combining libxml2/libxslt with the ElementTree API.


Mac OS
http://stackoverflow.com/questions/10666578/how-do-i-install-lxml-on-mac-os-x-10-7-4-i-have-exhausted-all-options
$ sudo port install python27 py27-lxml
